```{r, warning=FALSE, include = "FALSE"}
mn_sf = read_csv("Data/mn_sf.csv")

mn_sf <- mn_sf %>%
  mutate(popup_info = paste0(
    "<strong>", name, "</strong><br>",
    street, "<br>",
    city, ", ", state, " ", zip, "<br>",
    "Revenue: $", comma(revenue_amt)
  ))
```


To create this map, I used Minnesota's Exempt Organizations Business Master File (EO BMF) from the IRS. Using the addresses in the dataset, I retrieved their coordinates to map them. Processing thousands of nonprofits is compuationallyexpensive, hence a sample of 100 was chosen.
